headline: Piper Sandler Raises AppLovin (APP) Price Target, Keeps Overweight Rating
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the 15 Best Aggressive Growth Stocks to Buy Right Now. On November 6, Piper Sandler increased its price target on AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) from $740 to $800 and kept an Overweight rating on the stock. This decision by the firm came after AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) reported its results for […]
